tech-innovation.title: Tech Innovation Workshop
tech-innovation.shortDescription: Explore cutting-edge technologies and innovative solutions that are shaping the future of the tech industry.
tech-innovation.content:
## What is Tech Innovation Workshop?

The Tech Innovation Workshop is a comprehensive program designed to introduce participants to the latest technological advancements and innovative solutions shaping our future. This hands-on workshop combines theoretical knowledge with practical applications.

## Event Overview

Participants will engage in interactive sessions covering emerging technologies, including artificial intelligence, blockchain, IoT, and more. The workshop features industry experts who will share their insights and experiences.

## Rules and Guidelines

### Eligibility

- Open to all students and tech enthusiasts
- Teams of 1-4 members allowed
- Prior registration is mandatory
- Valid college ID required for entry

### Workshop Structure

1. **Morning Session (10:00 AM - 1:00 PM)**
   - Introduction to emerging technologies
   - Keynote speeches from industry leaders
   - Interactive Q&A sessions

2. **Afternoon Session (2:00 PM - 5:00 PM)**
   - Hands-on workshops
   - Team collaboration activities
   - Project presentations

### Code of Conduct

- Maintain professionalism at all times
- Respect fellow participants and speakers
- No plagiarism or unfair practices
- Follow the event schedule strictly
- Electronic devices must be in silent mode during sessions

### Important Notes

> "Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower." - Steve Jobs

Participants are encouraged to bring their laptops and necessary materials. Certificates will be provided to all attendees upon completion.

## What to Bring

- Laptop with necessary software installed
- Notebook and pen for taking notes
- Valid ID proof
- Confirmation email (printed or digital)

## Contact Information

For any queries, please contact:
- Email: events@gantavya.com
- Phone: +91 98765 43210

cultural-night.title: Cultural Night
cultural-night.shortDescription: Experience diverse cultures through music, dance, and art performances from around the world.
cultural-night.content:
## Cultural Night Extravaganza

Cultural Night is Gantavya's signature event celebrating diversity and artistic expression. Join us for an evening filled with mesmerizing performances, traditional dances, and cultural exhibitions.

## Event Highlights

### Performance Categories

1. **Traditional Dance**
   - Solo and group performances welcome
   - Duration: 5-8 minutes per performance
   - Props and costumes allowed

2. **Musical Performances**
   - Vocal and instrumental categories
   - Original compositions encouraged
   - Fusion music welcome

3. **Cultural Exhibitions**
   - Art displays
   - Traditional crafts
   - Cultural fashion shows

## Rules and Regulations

### Registration Guidelines

- Register at least 3 days before the event
- Submit performance details including duration and requirements
- Maximum 2 performances per participant
- Group size: up to 10 members

### Performance Rules

- Content must be appropriate for all age groups
- No offensive or inappropriate material
- Stay within allocated time limits
- Sound check must be completed 30 minutes before performance
- All props and costumes are participant's responsibility

### Judging Criteria

- Creativity and originality: 30%
- Technical execution: 30%
- Stage presence: 20%
- Audience engagement: 20%

## Facilities Provided

- Professional sound system
- Stage lighting
- Backstage preparation area
- Refreshments for participants

> Celebrate diversity, embrace culture!

hackathon.title: Hackathon Finals 2025
hackathon.shortDescription: 24-hour coding marathon where teams compete to build innovative solutions for real-world problems.
hackathon.content:
## Gantavya Hackathon 2025

The ultimate coding challenge where innovation meets implementation. Solve real-world problems through technology in this intensive 24-hour hackathon.

## Challenge Themes

### Primary Tracks

1. **Healthcare Technology**
   - Digital health solutions
   - Medical data management
   - Telemedicine platforms

2. **Sustainable Development**
   - Environmental monitoring
   - Resource optimization
   - Green technology solutions

3. **Education Technology**
   - Learning management systems
   - Educational tools and platforms
   - Accessibility solutions

4. **Open Innovation**
   - Any creative tech solution
   - Emerging technology applications
   - Social impact projects

## Rules and Guidelines

### Team Formation

- Teams of 2-4 members
- Cross-college teams allowed
- All team members must register individually
- Team leader must be designated during registration

### Technical Requirements

#### Allowed Technologies

- Any programming language
- Any framework or library
- Open source tools and APIs
- Cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)

#### Prohibited Practices

- Pre-written code before hackathon start
- Plagiarism of existing projects
- Use of paid services without disclosure
- Violation of API terms of service

### Project Submission

```markdown
Submission must include:
1. Source code (GitHub repository)
2. README with setup instructions
3. Demo video (max 3 minutes)
4. Presentation slides (max 10 slides)
5. Deployed application link (if applicable)
```

### Timeline

**Day 1 - March 20**
- 9:00 AM: Registration and team check-in
- 10:00 AM: Opening ceremony and theme announcement
- 11:00 AM: Hacking begins
- 1:00 PM: Lunch break
- 6:00 PM: Dinner
- 11:00 PM: Midnight snacks

**Day 2 - March 21**
- 2:00 AM: Snacks
- 6:00 AM: Breakfast
- 9:00 AM: Code freeze and submission deadline
- 10:00 AM: Project presentations begin
- 2:00 PM: Judging and results
- 3:00 PM: Prize distribution and closing ceremony

### Judging Criteria

| Criteria | Weight | Description |
|----------|--------|-------------|
| Innovation | 25% | Originality and creativity |
| Technical Implementation | 25% | Code quality and architecture |
| Impact | 20% | Real-world applicability |
| Design | 15% | User experience and interface |
| Presentation | 15% | Pitch and demo quality |

### Facilities Provided

- High-speed WiFi (1 Gbps)
- 24/7 Power backup
- Workstations and seating
- All meals and refreshments
- Mentors from industry
- Technical support team
- Sleeping area (optional)

### Important Notes

> **Code of Conduct:** Participants must maintain professionalism, respect diversity, and follow ethical coding practices.

### Prizes and Perks

- Cash prizes for top 3 teams
- Internship opportunities with sponsor companies
- GitHub Pro subscription (1 year)
- Interview fast-track with partner companies
- Certificates for all participants

## What to Bring

- **Mandatory:**
  - Laptop with charger
  - Valid ID proof
  - Registration confirmation

- **Recommended:**
  - Power bank
  - Mouse and keyboard
  - Extension cord
  - Sleeping bag (for rest area)
  - Personal toiletries

## Contact and Support

Technical queries: tech@gantavya.com
General queries: events@gantavya.com
24/7 Helpline: +91 98765 43210
